item.description:
Spring is a Fun time to get out & Enjoy Activities with your Favorite Pooch! This month we are celebrating Earth Day! We will have a Water Pool for doggies to splash around in, a Sand Box for them to Dig up Hidden Treasures, & Plenty of Stuffed Animals to Chase. Hope to see you all this month April 21st from 1:00pm-3:00pm.

Proof of Current Vaccines Required: Rabies, DHLPP, Bordatella

Friendly Doggies only Please!
item.name: Celebrate Earth Day!
